snippet.title: Crystalverse Teaser
snippet.description:
Crystalverse is a CO-OP Action-Adventure game where you play as a couple of explorers that find them selves separated in different realities and have to find a way to get back to each other by solving puzzles and defeating monsters.
Support this project at http://gamewisp.com/gonelf

Developed by Arcade Thumb (http://arcadethumb.com)

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
Please watch: "[Nintendo Switch] Unbox: Newbie's Adventure [Rapidinha]" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDM8Gs7zadw
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
